==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|たい|くん|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
Probably from {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=たいくん}} compound {{m|ltc|大勳|tr=*dhɑ̀i *xiuən}}. Compare modern {{etyl|cmn|-}} traditional {{m|cmn|大勳}} and simplified {{m|cmn|大勋|tr=dà xūn}}.

===Pronunciation===
* {{l|ja|sc=Latn|音読み|On'yomi}}
* {{ja-accent-common|h|た|いくん}}<ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>
* {{IPA|lang=ja|[ta̠ikɯ̃ᵝɴ]}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|たいくん}}

# a [[great]] [[deed]], [[distinguished]] [[service]], an [[excellent]] [[accomplishment]], a [[brilliant]] [[exploit]]

====Synonyms====
* {{ja-l|偉勲|いくん|ikun}}
* {{ja-l|大功|たいこう|taikō}}

====Usage notes====
* Although the term {{m|ja|大勲位|tr=dai-kun'i||[[w:Order of the Chrysanthemum|Order of the Chrysanthemum]]}} looks as if it might be derived from {{lang|ja|大勲}} (''taikun''), it is actually composed of {{m|ja|大|tr=dai||great, big}} + {{m|ja|勲位|tr=kun'i||Order of Merit}}.
